verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Come, come, buy from Me,
Gold refined by fire
That you may be rich. (2x)
Chorus:
Behold, I stand at the door and known.
Open, let Me in. (2x)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Come, come, buy white robes
That the shame of your nakedness
May be hid. (2x)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Come, come, buy from Me,
Salve to anoint your eyes
That you may see. (2x)
